aries: Jul 19, 2025- Don't automatically think that beauty has to be defined by old-fashioned standards, Aries. It's time to change the definition. taurus: Jul 19, 2025- Issues may get a little heavier than you'd like today, Taurus. Your job is to infuse some levity and humor into the situation. gemini: Jul 19, 2025- If the doorknob doesn't turn today, Gemini, don't force it. You will only break it. Perhaps you need to try another door. cancer: Jul 19, 2025- Your new approach to things might get some flack from superiors today, Cancer, but don't let that stop you. leo: Jul 19, 2025- You might be called upon to choose between two ways of handling a situation, Leo. The old way suddenly conflicts with the new. Which way are you going to proceed? virgo: Jul 19, 2025- Unexpected events could shuffle the cards when you least expect it, Virgo. If you haven't kept a close eye on the deck, you might get thrown for a loop. Don't be discouraged. scorpio: Jul 19, 2025- As you follow the path toward acquiring the latest, greatest, fastest, and best, you may have left behind some fundamental values, Scorpio. aquarius: Jul 19, 2025- A good tip to remember is to be careful about what you say about other people, Aquarius. If you're speaking about someone who isn't present, act like he or she is.
